paths.name: Main Entrance to Library
steps: Step 1: Start at the university entrance.
Step 3: Turn left at the main building.
Step 4: Continue for 200 meters until you reach the library.
Step 5: Your destination is on the left.

paths.name: Sports Complex to Cafeteria
steps: Step 2: Head east towards the cafeteria.
Step 4: Continue for 150 meters until you reach the cafeteria.
